inkball

接口 Calculate

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Ball, Linesegment

    public interface Calculate
    store several method to calculate

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static double getDistance(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      given 4 double value, calculate distance of two points, in order of x1, y1, x2, y2
      static double[] getMidPoint(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      get a double array of middle point
      static double[][] getNormalVectors(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      get an array of normal vectors

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        static double getDistance(double x1,
                          double y1,
                          double x2,
                          double y2)
        given 4 double value, calculate distance of two points, in order of x1, y1, x2, y2
        参数:
        x1 - first point x
        y1 - first point y
        x2 - second point x
        y2 - second point y
        返回:
        double distance

      • getMidPoint

        static double[] getMidPoint(double x1,
                            double y1,
                            double x2,
                            double y2)
        get a double array of middle point
        参数:
        x1 - first point x
        y1 - first point y
        x2 - second point x
        y2 - second point y
        返回:
        double array of middle point x, y coordinate

      • getNormalVectors

        static double[][] getNormalVectors(double x1,
                                   double y1,
                                   double x2,
                                   double y2)
        get an array of normal vectors
        参数:
        x1 - first point x
        y1 - first point y
        x2 - second point x
        y2 - second point y
        返回:
        double array, two vectores coordinate
